articles.title: Rafael Nadal's uncle spills major truth about Roger Federer - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: Toni Nadal admits Roger Federer is the GOAT, but issued a brutal truth bomb to the tennis legend.
articles.content:

articles.title: EPL plans presentation if Liverpool win - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: Premier League boss Richard Masters hopes Liverpool can have a trophy presentation if they complete their march to their first title in 30 years.
articles.content:
It will raise hopes among Liverpool supporters that the season can be completed, and Masters hopes that should they wrap up the title, they will be allowed to hold the traditional presentation.
"If it is at all possible, yes [we will hold one]," he said.

articles.author: Peter Ryan
articles.title: AFL members offered multiple options for 2020 - The Age
articles.description: While club members are still waiting, AFL members have been encouraged to choose one of four options that "best suit" their situation in 2020.
articles.content: Those who choose to become an absentee member will be refunded but will not receive a 30 per cent discount on next year's membership or a members' pack. However, they will be required to pay a $170 fee for adults, which would allow them to attend matches in 2… [+2697 chars]

articles.description: Bitter rivals Port Adelaide and Adelaide will share a hotel as Australian rules football teams go into quarantine before the new season.
